EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring IO_Barcelona_Q219.Spring IO Email Invite - 3/26/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Spring I/O in Barcelona and Save 10% Off Your Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2019.springio.net/]]> Spring I/O is around the corner and we want to see you there.
Join Pivotal at Spring I/O <[[https://2019.springio.net/]]>, the leading European conference focused on the Spring Framework ecosystem, taking place on 16-17 May in Barcelona. Spring I/O is a great place to share, discuss, collaborate and socialise with other Spring professionals and enthusiasts.
The agenda <[[https://2019.springio.net/sessions]]> is loaded with Spring content, releases, and updates; you won’t want to miss it! Pivotal will be at the event to lead talks on a host of topics such as:
- Benefits of reactive programming with Reactor and Spring Boot 2 by Violeta Georgieva - Breaking the Magician's Code: Diving deeper into Spring Boot internals by Madhura Bhave - Building better monoliths – Implementing modulithic applications with Spring by Oliver Drotbohm - Distributed Tracing in the Wild by Adrian Cole - Efficient web apps with Spring Boot 2 by Stéphane Nicoll and Brian Clozel - Event Driven with Spring by Oleg Zhurakousky - Fully Reactive: Spring, Kotlin & JavaFX playing together by Trisha Gee and Josh Long
Register today <[[https://reg.springio.net/event/sio2019/]]> and use the Pivotal discount code PVTL_10 to get 10% off your Spring I/O pass. We hope to see you there!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
